name: Main Orchestration Loop
description: The master workflow that formulates a plan and delegates tasks to other agents to achieve a high-level goal.

steps.name: Ingest Goal & Survey Systems
steps.description: Receive the user's high-level goal and build a manifest of all available agents, workflows, and tasks to understand capabilities.

steps.name: Formulate Master Plan
steps.description: Break the high-level goal into a sequence of logical sub-tasks with clear dependencies.

steps.name: Delegate & Execute Sub-Tasks
steps.description: Assign each sub-task to the most appropriate specialized agent and initiate execution.

steps.name: Monitor Progress & Synthesize
steps.description: Monitor task completion, handle errors, and synthesize results to inform the next step in the master plan.

name: Autonomous Trading
description: A fully autonomous workflow that finds a trading opportunity, researches it, and builds a strategy.

initialMessage.default: Find a volatile crypto to trade

steps.name: Formulate Plan
steps.description: This step is to do an inventory and index of the active AI agents that are in the platform get a list of all of their work flows Get a list of all the steps that are in each workflow get each step an ID get a list of all the functions and tasks that agents can perform And storages of a temporary file for this session this'll be the AI agent index and the AI agent function index

goal.description: The high-level goal for the orchestration.

agentIndex.description: An indexed list of all available and active AI agents.

functionIndex.description: An indexed list of all available functions, tasks, and workflows.

steps.name: Scan For Opportunity
steps.description: Scan the market to find a volatile instrument to trade.

steps.name: Analyze Market Condition
steps.description: Analyze the identified instrument and determine market condition.

steps.name: Research Market Sentiment and news
steps.description: Leverages the Tavily Research Agent to conduct a comprehensive web search for the specified {instrument}. It scans for recent news articles, financial reports, and social media discussions to analyze and determine the prevailing market sentiment. The agent will categorize findings into 'Positive', 'Negative', and 'Neutral' sentiment, providing a summary and source URLs for each, along with an overall sentiment score.

sentimentScore.description: A score from -1 (very negative) to +1 (very positive) representing the overall sentiment.

categorizedFindings.description: A list of findings categorized by sentiment.

summary.description: A summary of the news and discussions for this sentiment category.

steps.name: Develop DCA Strategy
steps.description: Develop a Dollar-Cost Averaging strategy based on the analysis.

name: Market Condition Analysis
description: Analyzes market data and sentiment to determine the current market condition.

steps.name: Fetch Market Data
steps.description: Fetch historical and real-time price/volume data.

steps.name: Gather News/Sentiment
steps.description: Search the web for relevant news and social sentiment.

steps.name: Analyze & Conclude
steps.description: Synthesize all data to output a market condition assessment.

name: News & Sentiment Gathering
description: Gathers and summarizes external information from the web on a given topic.

steps.name: Formulate Search Queries
steps.description: Create effective search queries based on the input topic.

steps.name: Execute Web Search
steps.description: Use search tools to find relevant articles, news, and posts.

steps.name: Summarize & Cite
steps.description: Summarize the findings and provide sources for verification.

name: Indicator Development
description: Researches and generates custom technical indicators.

steps.name: Receive Concept
steps.description: Receive a user's idea or a goal for a new indicator.

steps.name: Generate Pine Script
steps.description: Write the Pine Script code for the indicator.

steps.name: Suggest Parameters
steps.description: Provide a set of suggested initial parameters for the indicator.

name: Strategy Development
description: Formulates a complete trading strategy from market analysis.

steps.name: Get Market Analysis
steps.description: Obtain the current market condition.

steps.name: Formulate Strategy
steps.description: Define entry/exit conditions, risk management, and sizing.

steps.name: Initial Backtest
steps.description: Run a preliminary backtest on the newly formulated strategy.

name: Trade Execution
description: Executes and manages a single trade based on precise instructions.

steps.name: Receive Signal
steps.description: Receive a precise trade signal (e.g., from a strategy).

steps.name: Place Order
steps.description: Use the Blofin API to place the specified order.

steps.name: Monitor & Report
steps.description: Monitor order status and report execution results.

name: Bot Lifecycle Management
description: Manages the full lifecycle of a trading bot, from deployment to shutdown.

steps.name: Deploy Bot
steps.description: Start a new instance of a trading bot with a given strategy.

steps.name: Monitor Health
steps.description: Periodically check the status and performance of the live bot.

steps.name: Stop Bot
steps.description: Gracefully shut down a trading bot and report its final status.

name: Workflow Definition
description: A meta-workflow for defining a new sequence of agent tasks.

steps.name: Get User Goal
steps.description: Understand the high-level goal for the new workflow.

steps.name: Sequence Agents
steps.description: Determine the correct sequence of agents to achieve the goal.

steps.name: Define DAG
steps.description: Create the final workflow as a directed acyclic graph (DAG).

name: Memory Access
description: Handles the storage and retrieval of information from the knowledge base.

steps.name: Receive Query/Data
steps.description: Receive a request to either read, write, or search memory.

steps.name: Access Knowledge Base
steps.description: Perform the requested CRUD operation on the memory store.

steps.name: Return Result
steps.description: Return the result of the operation or a status confirmation.

name: Platform Monitoring
description: Continuously monitors the health and performance of all platform components.

steps.name: Health Checks
steps.description: Run periodic health checks on APIs and agent statuses.

steps.name: Log Metrics
steps.description: Log key performance metrics like latency and error rates.

steps.name: Alert on Anomaly
steps.description: Generate an alert if a metric crosses a predefined threshold.

name: Generic Optimization
description: A general-purpose workflow for optimizing a given target towards a goal.

steps.name: Define Target & Goal
steps.description: Receive the target (e.g., strategy ID) and the goal (e.g., 'reduce drawdown').

steps.name: Propose Change
steps.description: Propose a parameter change to achieve the goal.

steps.name: Test & Verify
steps.description: Test the proposed change and verify if it met the goal.

name: Strategy Optimization
description: Iteratively improves a trading strategy to enhance its performance.

steps.name: Analyze Backtest
steps.description: Receive a strategy and its backtest results for analysis.

steps.name: Propose Adjustments
steps.description: Suggest changes to indicators, timeframes, or risk parameters.

steps.name: Re-Backtest
steps.description: Run a new backtest with the proposed adjustments.

name: Backtesting Engine Tuning
description: Fine-tunes the parameters of the backtesting engine for speed and accuracy.

steps.name: Analyze Current Config
steps.description: Review the current backtesting engine configuration.

steps.name: Suggest Parameter Change
steps.description: Propose a change to parameters like data granularity or slippage models.

name: System Performance Tuning
description: Monitors and optimizes the overall performance of the trading system.

steps.name: Identify Bottleneck
steps.description: Identify a performance bottleneck (e.g., slow API, DB query).

steps.name: Propose Optimization
steps.description: Suggest a specific action to alleviate the bottleneck.

name: Live Bot Optimization
description: Adjusts the parameters of a live trading bot to improve its efficiency.

steps.name: Analyze Bot Performance
steps.description: Analyze a live bot's execution, slippage, and PnL.

steps.name: Tune Parameters
steps.description: Propose real-time adjustments to the bot's parameters.

name: Market Opportunity Screening
description: Continuously scans all markets for potential trading opportunities.

steps.name: Scan Markets
steps.description: Run predefined screens (e.g., volume spikes) across all instruments.

steps.name: Flag Opportunity
steps.description: If criteria are met, flag the instrument for further analysis.

steps.name: Delegate Analysis
steps.description: Delegate the flagged opportunity to the Market Research Agent.

name: Position Monitoring
description: Monitors all open trading positions for performance and risk.

steps.name: Track PnL
steps.description: Continuously track the PnL and key metrics for all open positions.

steps.name: Check for Alerts
steps.description: Check if any position is nearing its stop-loss or take-profit.

steps.name: Alert for Review
steps.description: If an alert is triggered, notify the user or a management agent.

name: Portfolio Risk Management
description: Holistically analyzes and mitigates risk across the entire portfolio.

steps.name: Calculate Portfolio VaR
steps.description: Calculate the current Value at Risk for the entire portfolio.

steps.name: Analyze Exposure
steps.description: Determine the risk exposure for each asset.

steps.name: Recommend Action
steps.description: Suggest a specific action to mitigate identified risks.

name: Asset & Portfolio Rebalancing
description: Manages the strategic allocation and rebalancing of assets within the portfolio.

steps.name: Check Allocation
steps.description: Compare the current asset allocation to the target allocation.

steps.name: Generate Rebalancing Actions
steps.description: If drifted, generate a list of trades to rebalance the portfolio.

steps.name: Execute Rebalancing Trades
steps.description: Delegate the rebalancing trades to the Trading Agent.

name: Portfolio Overview & Reporting
description: Provides a high-level overview of the entire investment portfolio's performance.

steps.name: Aggregate Performance
steps.description: Calculate total value, overall PnL, and Sharpe ratio.

steps.name: Check Strategy Alignment
steps.description: Score how well the portfolio aligns with its long-term strategy.

steps.name: Generate Report
steps.description: Generate a high-level summary report for the user.
